description:
An old-school look built from a strong modern fabrics. The Lug Tote Bag's durable sailcloth resists nicks and tears, so it stands up to the rigours of daily life. A removable shoulder strap offers carrying options should you want to go hands-free, and neoprene internal pockets stretch to hold your daily essentials.

  • Made of heavy-duty polyester twill sailcloth with a traditional military feel
  • Adjustable, removable shoulder strap lets you carry the bag like a messenger or a briefcase
  • Removable crossbody strap increases stabilization
  • Rear zippered pocket for organization of small items
  • Neoprene internal pockets have some stretch and cushion
name: Timbuk2 Lug Tote Bag - Unisex
